com.wolvencraft.yasp.listeners

Class PlayerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.listeners.PlayerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener

    public class PlayerListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements Listener
    Listens to miscellaneous player events on the server and reports them to the plugin.
    Author:
    bitWolfy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerListener(Statistics plugin)
      Default constructor
      Creates a new instance of the Listener and registers it with the PluginManager
